about_the_game:
Flash Gordon Combat Map 1: Arboria + Fast Pursuit Rocket

Without a doubt, the Fast Pursuit Rocket is the swiftest skyship in Ming's Imperial fleet.
A double-sided, 24" x 30" combat map of a Fast Pursuit Rocket on one side and Arboria (with tree outpost) on the other, this map is designed for use with our Flash Gordon miniatures! Maps are wet, dry, and permanent marker erasable.
Bring the verdant elevations of the Great Tree Highway and swampy sod of Arboria to your tabletop!
Featuring multiple levels of wooden platforms, swinging bridges, ropes to swing from--not to mention a rather threatening-looking stump of many holes--and a wicker cage for trespassers, this map inspires plenty of action for characters in The Savage World of Flash Gordon(TM) .
This full color map has a layer with a 1" grid.
This product requires the Flash Gordon(TM) RPG and Savage Worlds  core rules to play. This product was written for Savage Worlds Deluxe, but is easily adaptable for the Adventure Edition.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic
